verses.text: \w And|strong="H0559"\w* \w Eliphaz|strong="H0464"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Themanite, \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Will|strong="H7307"\w* \w a|strong="H7307"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w as|strong="H4390"\w* if \w he|strong="H7307"\w* \w were|strong="H4390"\w* speaking \w in|strong="H2450"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H2450"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w his|strong="H4390"\w* \w stomach|strong="H0990"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* burning heat?

Thou reprovest him \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w who|strong="H3198"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* equal \w to|strong="H1697"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* thou speakest \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H3276"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* thee.

\w As|strong="H6440"\w* \w much|strong="H0637"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H0410"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* thee, thou hast made void \w fear|strong="H3374"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* hast \w taken|strong="H1639"\w* \w away|strong="H1639"\w* prayers \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* hath taught thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* thou imitatest \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* blasphemers.

Thy own \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w*: \w and|strong="H6310"\w* thy own \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* thee.

Art thou \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H7223"\w* \w was|strong="H6440"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w*, \w or|strong="H0120"\w* wast thou made \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*?

Hast thou \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w Godâ€™s|strong="H0433"\w* \w counsel|strong="H5475"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* shall \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w be|strong="H2451"\w* inferior \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee?

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* knowest thou \w that|strong="H3045"\w* we \w are|strong="H4100"\w* ignorant \w of|strong="H3045"\w*? \w what|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* we \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*?

There \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w aged|strong="H3453"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* ancient \w men|strong="H3453"\w*, \w much|strong="H3524"\w* elder \w than|strong="H1571"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H1697"\w* it \w a|strong="H4480"\w* great \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* should comfort thee? \w but|strong="H5973"\w* thy wicked \w words|strong="H1697"\w* hinder \w this|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* doth thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* elevate thee, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou stare \w with|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w as|strong="H3947"\w* if \w they|strong="H4100"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* thinking great things?

\w Why|strong="H3588"\w* doth thy \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* swell \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* utter such \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*?

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w man|strong="H0582"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w be|strong="H0582"\w* without spot, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* appear \w just|strong="H6663"\w*?

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w saints|strong="H6918"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* unchangeable, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pure|strong="H2141"\w* \w in|strong="H0539"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w How|strong="H0637"\w* \w much|strong="H0637"\w* \w more|strong="H0637"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w abominable|strong="H8581"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* unprofitable, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* drinketh \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* \w like|strong="H0376"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*?

\w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H2088"\w* shew thee, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* me: \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H2088"\w* \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* thee \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H8085"\w* \w seen|strong="H2372"\w*.

\w Wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w* \w confess|strong="H5046"\w* \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H0834"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w To|strong="H5414"\w* whom \w alone|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* stranger hath \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* proud \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* tyranny \w is|strong="H1931"\w* uncertain.

\w The|strong="H0935"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w dread|strong="H6343"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* always \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w there|strong="H7965"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w he|strong="H0935"\w* always suspecteth treason.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* believeth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* light, looking round \w about|strong="H0413"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* every side.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* moveth \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* seek \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* knoweth \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

Tribulation \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w terrify|strong="H1204"\w* \w him|strong="H8630"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w distress|strong="H6862"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* surround \w him|strong="H8630"\w*, \w as|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6264"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* the battle.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* hath strengthened \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*.

He hath \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* \w neck|strong="H6677"\w* raised \w up|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H4043"\w* \w is|strong="H4043"\w* \w armed|strong="H4043"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H6677"\w* fat \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*.

\w Fatness|strong="H2459"\w* hath \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* hangeth \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* sides.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w desolate|strong="H3582"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* desert \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* reduced into \w heaps|strong="H1530"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w enriched|strong="H6238"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5186"\w* \w substance|strong="H2428"\w* \w continue|strong="H6965"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w push|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H5186"\w* root \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*: \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w flame|strong="H7957"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* branches, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* own month.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H8545"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w believe|strong="H0539"\w*, \w being|strong="H1961"\w* vainly \w deceived|strong="H8582"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* error, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* redeemed \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* price.

\w Before|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H4390"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* perish: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H4390"\w* hands \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* wither away.

He shall be blasted as \w a|strong="H7993"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* when \w its|strong="H7993"\w* grapes are \w in|strong="H1612"\w* \w the|strong="H7993"\w* first \w flower|strong="H5328"\w*, \w and|strong="H1612"\w* as \w an|strong="H7993"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w tree|strong="H2132"\w* that casteth \w its|strong="H7993"\w* \w flower|strong="H5328"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* hypocrite \w is|strong="H0168"\w* \w barren|strong="H1565"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w shall|strong="H5712"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* tabernacles, \w who|strong="H3588"\w* love \w to|strong="H0168"\w* take \w bribes|strong="H7810"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0990"\w* hath \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H0205"\w*, \w and|strong="H2029"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, \w and|strong="H2029"\w* \w his|strong="H3559"\w* \w womb|strong="H0990"\w* prepareth deceits.
